name: Bad fire
description:
This game was made as part of the Miz Jam 1,  a 48 hours non consecutive game jam.  In this jam everyone has to use the same art kit provided by Kenney. This is the first game jam I have participated in and I had a lot of fun making this. It is not a very long game,  in any case, I'd be glad to hear what you think. Download the executable for Windows below to try it out!

If your curious what I am up to, visit me at my website: edvin.space

The source files can be found in the following Github repository: Source for Bad Fire (Miz Jam 1)
